STD.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a disease that one person passes to another through having sex, such as AIDS or herpes
STD.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: subscriber trunk dialling; in Britain, the name for the former telephone system that allowed people to connect their own long-distance calls by using an STD code (=a special number for the area you are calling). Officially, STD codes are now called area codes although many people still use the old name
